p: The geographical distribution of H. pubescens is shown in Figure 1. It is native to South-central China, Cambodia, Myanmar, Thailand, Vietnam, India, Nepal, Bhutan, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Laos, Malawi, Mozambique, Kenya, Northern Tanzania, Za√Øre, Zambia and Zimbabwe. It was introduced in South-east China, Hainan, Taiwan, and Mauritius, but its presence in Malaysia is doubtful.
